title: Assignments and Bill of Sale that junk debt buyers include in your discovery requests
question: Assignments and Bill of Sale that junk debt buyers include in your discovery requests never have letterhead and are sent copies on blank paper. I would assume these documents are false
answers: I agree with Mr. Stempler's excellent answer.
Robert is right...you should consult with an attorney

If a witness can competently testify as to their authenticity and manner of preparation, then it is possible the documents to which you refer may be considered a business record, such that a judge can consider the evidence and enter a money judgment. I would not assume a document is false, until you have heard what witnesses will testify about them at trial or in a deposition. Consult a debt collection DEFENSE attorney.
